description: This file defines a React functional component 'UploadPanel' that provides a drag-and-drop file upload interface with preview, status updates, and mock upload functionality using an API client.

methods.name: UploadPanel
methods.description: React component rendering an upload interface with drag-and-drop and file selection, managing upload state and simulating upload via an API call.

methods.name: onFilesSelected
methods.description: Handles file selection, filtering for specific file types, and updating the component state.

methods.name: onUpload
methods.description: Simulates uploading selected files by sending their metadata to an API endpoint and updating the status.
